conversation.body:
https://github.com/PX4/Firmware/issues/10064

@PX4/testflights please test this pull request, it will become the v1.8.1 release.

issue_comments.body: Thanks for the summary @Avysuarez. These look consistent with v1.8.0 stable, which still needs a few more commits for full pixhawk 4 mini support.
